author: Vertyco
end_user_data_statement: This cog records Discord ID's and messages sent for each user
install_msg:
Thank you for installing LevelUp! type `[p]help LevelUp`. To enable leveling in this server type `[p]lset toggle`. To see all commands.

DOCUMENTATION: https://github.com/vertyco/vrt-cogs/blob/main/levelup/README.md
